analysis.key_quote: By stripping civil service protections and centralizing power, this policy sets a dangerous precedent: no one, including its designers, is safe from political retribution.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting the dangers of politicization and the loss of merit-based protections, emphasizing that it undermines due process and could lead to political retaliation against all employees, including those who support it.
